text:
Hope Elizabeth "Liza" Soberano (born January 4, 1998) is a Filipina-American actress and model. She started acting in a range of television series and movies, including "Wansapanataym" (2011), "Kung Ako'y Iiwan Mo" (2012), "She's the One" (2013), "Must Be... Love"(2013). She rose to fame after playing the main role in the romantic comedy television series "Forevermore" (2014–2015) with Enrique Gil. She has since paired with Gil in the movies "Just The Way You Are" (2015), "Everyday I Love You" (2015), "My Ex and Whys" (2017), "Together" (2019) and the television series "Dolce Amore" (2016), "Bagani" (2018) and "Make It with You" (2020).
Soberano is a Roman Catholic.
